content:
Hi everyone!
my message is somewhat off-topic the ongoing conversation, regardless is important to those working in "open scientific research" type of environments.

I've uploaded this morning my most recent C++ library, this one for data management using the GitHub REST API
https://github.com/aeonSolutions/AeonLabs-GitHub-API-C-library

as always, released under Creative Commons licensing for anyone to use in the laboratory.

This is now the 2nd C++ library I make available to anyone to use, in tandem with the C++ library for the Dataverse API.
Ending 2024, starting in 2025, I'll be coding a similar library for Zenodo ! so make sure to check my profile on GitHub for updates on this.
@Miguel Tomas Pinto Silva congrats on the release!
